scenario_text.value: Oh Takuma, have you seen my ring?

The one you had before? Can’t say that
I have. What happened?

I must have lost it somewhere...
How careless of me.

No, you’re not careless!
It was just bad luck!

I’ll keep an eye out for it. If I find
anything I’ll let you know.

Thank you.
How could I be so thoughtless...?

Don’t fret so much!
This sort of thing happens to everyone!

Sorry to be a bother when you’re so busy.
I’ll look too, but tell me if you find it.
